name: EduBlocks
description: EduBlocks is proprietary software made by Letseduvate solely for educational purposes. It enables the user to code the Arduino UNO with the help of graphical programming. It has various modules in that they contain simplified blocks of codes. All the blocks of codes are self-explanatory. It uses drag and drop functionality for writing the code in the app. The user can upload the code to the Arduino UNO using USB or Bluetooth.  The various modules included are logic, control, math, text, variables, functions, input/output, servo.  Features: *Learn to program Arduino with the help of graphical programming blocks. *Users can program Arduino either with the help of USB or Bluetooth module(HC-05). *Offline Support: Work without an Internet connection. *Professional Technical Team: Continuous software optimization ensures a stable user experience. *Additional help section for users.
